20110107073944.000|20110107073945.000|CC1|>> COLE, I THINK, BECAUSE OF HIS
20110107073945.000|20110107073947.000|CC1|FAMILY HISTORY, AND BECAUSE HE  
20110107073947.000|20110107073948.000|CC1|REALLY CYCLES, WILL PROBABLY END

20110107073949.000|20110107073952.000|CC1|OF BIPOLAR DISORDER.

20110107073954.000|20110107073954.000|CC1|AN EXTREMELY CONTROVERSIAL      
20110107073954.000|20110107073957.000|CC1|TREATMENT.                      
20110107073957.000|20110107074000.000|CC1|WHEN COLE WAS ONLY 3 1/2 YEARS  
20110107074000.000|20110107074001.000|CC1|OLD, THE DOCTOR PRESCRIBED A    
20110107074001.000|20110107074002.000|CC1|POTENT MIX OF PSYCHIATRIC DRUGS 
20110107074002.000|20110107074004.000|CC1|FOR HIM, INCLUDING ADDERALL TO  
20110107074004.000|20110107074010.000|CC1|TREAT HIS ADHD.

20110107074012.000|20110107074012.000|XDS|%   LENGTH: 0:05:00 of 0:31:00
20110107074012.000|20110107074013.000|CC1|STABILIZE HIS MOOD.             
20110107074013.000|20110107074013.000|CC1|>> OBVIOUSLY I SAID HECK NO.

20110107074015.000|20110107074016.000|CC1|>> I WAS SCARED, TOO, BECAUSE

20110107074017.000|20110107074018.000|CC1|HIM, THERE IS ALWAYS A DEATH

20110107074042.000|20110107074042.000|CC1|DECISION FOR SHE AND HER HUSBAND

20110107074047.000|20110107074048.000|CC1|YOU, TOO, TO RECOMMEND IT?      
20110107074048.000|20110107074049.000|CC1|>> HUGE DECISION, YEAH.         
20110107074049.000|20110107074050.000|CC1|BACK IN THE OLD DAYS, A KID LIKE

20110107074052.000|20110107074053.000|CC1|THAT ACUTE?                     
20110107074053.000|20110107074059.000|CC1|>> OH, YES.                     
20110107074059.000|20110107074100.000|CC1|>> Reporter: BUT THE MEDS DIDN'T
20110107074100.000|20110107074100.000|CC1|WORK.                           
20110107074100.000|20110107074102.000|CC1|THE RAGES CONTINUED.            
20110107074102.000|20110107074104.000|CC1|WHEN COLE WAS 6 1/2, THE DOCTOR 
20110107074104.000|20110107074105.000|CC1|TOOK WHAT MANY CONSIDER A       
20110107074105.000|20110107074108.000|CC1|RADICAL NEXT STEP.              
20110107074108.000|20110107074110.000|CC1|PRESCRIBING LITHIUM FOR COLE.   
20110107074110.000|20110107074111.000|CC1|THE POWERFUL ANTI-PSYCHOTIC USED
20110107074111.000|20110107074114.000|CC1|FOR ADULTS WITH BIPOLAR DISEASE.
20110107074115.000|20110107074115.000|XDS|%   LENGTH: 0:06:00 of 0:31:00
20110107074114.000|20110107074116.000|CC1|>> BEHOLD.                      
20110107074116.000|20110107074118.000|CC1|HE GETS BETTER WITH LITHIUM.    
20110107074118.000|20110107074120.000|CC1|HE REALLY, IF HE HAS THE RAGES  
20110107074120.000|20110107074125.000|CC1|NOW, THEY'RE MUCH MORE SUBDUED. 
20110107074125.000|20110107074126.000|CC1|>> LOOK AT THAT.                
20110107074126.000|20110107074127.000|CC1|>> Reporter: THAT IS AWESOME!   
20110107074127.000|20110107074128.000|CC1|NEVERTHELESS, THE USE OF SUCH   
20110107074128.000|20110107074130.000|CC1|DRUGS IN VERY YOUNG CHILDREN IS 
20110107074130.000|20110107074135.000|CC1|HIGHLY CONTROVERSIAL.           
20110107074135.000|20110107074137.000|CC1|PSYCHIATRIST, MARK OLSON, HAS   
20110107074137.000|20110107074138.000|CC1|STUDIED THE RATE AT WHICH       
20110107074138.000|20110107074139.000|CC1|ANTI-PSYCHOTICS ARE BEING       
20110107074139.000|20110107074140.000|CC1|DESCRIBED FOR KIDS A RATE THAT'S
20110107074140.000|20110107074141.000|CC1|DOUBLED FOR PRESCHOOLERS IN THE 
20110107074141.000|20110107074142.000|CC1|LAST DECADE.                    
20110107074142.000|20110107074146.000|CC1|GIVE ME A SENSE OF HOW MANY     
20110107074146.000|20110107074147.000|CC1|CHILDREN AND ADOLESCENTS ARE    
20110107074147.000|20110107074147.000|CC1|TAKING THESE ANTI-PSYCHOTIC     
20110107074147.000|20110107074149.000|CC1|DRUGS.                          
20110107074149.000|20110107074151.000|CC1|>> I'VE SEEN ESTIMATES AS LOW AS
20110107074151.000|20110107074152.000|CC1|HALF A MILLION IN THE COURSE OF 
20110107074152.000|20110107074155.000|CC1|A YEAR, BUT THERE ARE OTHER THAT
20110107074155.000|20110107074155.000|CC1|SUGGEST SEVERAL MILLION         
20110107074155.000|20110107074159.000|CC1|CHILDREN.                       
20110107074159.000|20110107074201.000|CC1|>> SEVERAL MILLION CHILDREN?    
20110107074201.000|20110107074202.000|CC1|>> THAT'S RIGHT.                
20110107074202.000|20110107074203.000|CC1|THAT'S PART OF THE CONCERN HERE.
20110107074203.000|20110107074204.000|CC1|THAT MOST OF THE TIME, THE      
20110107074204.000|20110107074206.000|CC1|MEDICATIONS ARE BEING DESCRIBED 
20110107074206.000|20110107074208.000|CC1|TO CHILDREN, BUT BEING
